Description:
Support maintenance and implementation of the Contract Management System
Support delivery of the contract Assurance Programme
Conduct Vendor and Supplier Qualification Evaluations
Support in conducting root cause analysis of project nonconformities and technical incidents
Attend project kick off meetings to provide QA/QC input
Provide Quality support to in-country site-based engineering team
Determine inspection level and requirements of product/material
Review and approve product/material requisitions and validate QC requirements
Provide Quality input to technical bid evaluationsSkills
